meanings.definition: A variety of pyroxene mineral commonly found in igneous rocks.
meanings.sent1: The geologist identified the augites in the rock sample.
meanings.sent2: Igneous rocks often contain augites like this one.
meanings.sent3: The augites in the rock seemed to be playing hide and seek with the geologist.
meanings.sent4: The augites sparkled like tiny gems in the dark rock.
meanings.sent5: The augites stood out in the rock, their dark color contrasting with the surrounding minerals.
